6e66b70a-04d0-429f-ade7-39af3412f783.description:
As the time of the execution of the run-perl-tests was getting too long a separation was needed for:
 - run-perl-unit-tests - quick check of which of the modules is broken if there is any 
 - run-perl-integration-tests - check for the integrity of the whole application
6e66b70a-04d0-429f-ade7-39af3412f783.name: create separate run-perl-unit-tests and run-perl-integration-tests actions
